column1: '''''On Translating Beowulf''''' is the title of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s essay  published in [[1940]] as "Prefatory Remarks on Prose Translation of Beowulf
column2:
an introduction to [[Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment]]  by John R. Clark Hall.
In [[1983]], it was reprinted in ''[[The Monsters and the Critics and Other Essays]]''.
